word:
"Three hundred came forward for prayers. We then gave them 
     opportunity to express their feelings and one hundred and thirty 
     testimonies were borne. Frequently four were on their feet at once, 
     talking and confessing with tears their sins and their departure 
     from God. I never saw it on this wise before. As the result of the 
     meeting, forty-eight were baptized. All went to their homes 
     encouraged and many were signally blessed.
